# See https://github.com/check-spelling/check-spelling/wiki/Configuration-Examples:-excludes
(?:^|/)(?i)COPYRIGHT
(?:^|/)(?i)LICEN[CS]E
(?:^|/)package(?:-lock|)\.json$
(?:^|/)vendor/
ignore$
\.avi$
\.bmp$
\.gif$
\.ico$
\.jpe?g$
\.lock$
\.map$
\.min\.
\.mod$
\.mp[34]$
\.png$
\.tiff$
\.wav$
\.webp$
^nextjs/
^packages/generator/templates/app/\.vscode/extensions\.json$
^README\.md$
^recipes/tailwind/templates/config/postcss\.config\.js$
^\.all-contributorsrc$
^\.github/
